dialogue.intro: "Sorry can't talk right now, I'm a bit too busy"

You walk up to Brent, who is hunched over his laptop and busily typing away. You quickly tell him how the changes from last sprint got deleted, and he is going to have to rewrite them all.
"I'll get on that, I've just got to finish this method for Sarah first."
It appears that Sarah called him and strong armed him into doing the work that she wanted done, even though it wasn't assigned for this sprint. Your team appears to be backed up on both last week's and this week's sprints. You should talk to Patty to get a plan together to get all your stories done on time.
